name: Darkwater Dispatch
description:
We've got work for you, Courier. Deliveries, to be precise. High stakes, high reward, you in?

The Crown has come to discover & eradicate Darkwater deliverypersons. Exhibit discretion, watch your Sonar, and you may see the light of Day.

A stealth dark-ocean adventure created for Ludum Dare 51 with the theme of "Every 10 Seconds". Your sonar will complete one sweep in that time. Work with limited information to avoid enemy ships & make dropoffs at Darkwater Docks!

Good luck, Couriers. Remember to share your cash hauls in the comments- how long can YOU survive?

You can take 3 hits, and have 3 boosts!

Controls:

- Left click & hold to move.

- Space to boost.
